languages.text: "Во имя Великого, шерин, постарайтесь не привлекать столько внимания, когда будете откручивать вентили!"

traits.locale_text: "Во имя Великого, шерин, постарайтесь не привлекать столько внимания, когда будете откручивать вентили!"

languages.text: "By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're turning the valves!"
languages.original_text: "Во имя Великого, шерин, постарайтесь не привлекать столько внимания, когда будете откручивать вентили!"

traits.locale_text: "By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're unscrewing the valves!"
"By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're unscrewing the valves!"
"By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're unscrewing the valves!"
"By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're unscrewing the valves!"
"By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're turning the valves!"

languages.text: 「シェリーン、エグザルテッド・ワンの名において、バルブを回すのにこんなに注意を引かれたら堪らない！」
languages.original_text: "By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're turning the valves!"

traits.locale_text: 「ちょっとダーリン。エグザルテッド・ワンの名において、バルブを緩めるのにこんなに注意を引かれたら堪らない！」

languages.text: « Par l'Exalté ! Shereen, évitez d'attirer l'attention en actionnant les vannes ! »
languages.original_text: "By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're turning the valves!"

traits.locale_text: « Par l'Exalté ! Shereen, évitez d'attirer l'attention en actionnant les vannes ! »

languages.text: “至高无上的神皇啊，亲爱的，拧阀门的时候当心点，尽量别引起太多人注意！”
languages.original_text: "By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're turning the valves!"

traits.locale_text: “至高无上的神皇啊，亲爱的，拧阀门的时候当心点，尽量别引起太多人注意！”

languages.text: "Beim Erhabenen, Shereen, versucht bitte, nicht zu viel Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen, wenn Ihr die Ventile dreht!"
languages.original_text: "By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're turning the valves!"

traits.locale_text: "Beim Erhabenen, Shereen, versucht bitte, nicht zu viel Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen, wenn Ihr die Ventile abschraubt!"

languages.text: «Por el Exaltado, shereen, ¡no llames tanto la atención mientras giras las válvulas!».
languages.original_text: "By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're turning the valves!"

traits.locale_text: «Por el Exaltado, shereen, ¡no llames tanto la atención mientras desatornillas las válvulas!».

languages.text: "Görkemli adına... Şirinim, lütfen vanaları çevirirken bu kadar ses yapmamaya çalış!"
languages.original_text: "By the Exalted One, shereen, please try not to attract this much attention when you're turning the valves!"
